Air.title: Air
Air.description: How much air the entity has, in game ticks.

CustomName.title: Custom Name
CustomName.description: The custom name text component of this entity.

CustomNameVisible.title: Custom Name Visible
CustomNameVisible.description: If true, and this entity has a custom name, the name always appears above the entity, regardless of where the cursor points.

Fire.title: Fire
Fire.description: Number of game ticks until the fire is put out.

Glowing.title: Glowing
Glowing.description: If true, the entity has a glowing outline.

HasVisualFire.title: Has Visual Fire
HasVisualFire.description: If true, the entity visually appears on fire, even if it is not actually on fire.

Invulnerable.title: Invulnerable
Invulnerable.description: If true, the entity should not take damage.

Motion.title: Motion
Motion.description: List of 3 doubles describing the dx, dy, and dz velocity.

NoGravity.title: No Gravity
NoGravity.description: If True, the entity does not fall down naturally.

OnGroud.title: On Ground
OnGroud.description: If true, the entity is touching the ground.

Passengers.title: Passengers
Passengers.description: The data of the entities that are riding this entity.

PortalCooldown.title: Portal Cooldown
PortalCooldown.description: The number of game ticks before which the entity may be teleported back through a nether portal.

Pos.title: Pos
Pos.description: List of 3 doubles describing the current X, Y, and Z of the entity.

Rotation.title: Rotation
Rotation.description: List of 2 floats representing the entity's facing direction.

Silent.title: Silent
Silent.description: If true, this entity is silenced.

Tags.title: Tags
Tags.description: List of scoreboard tags of this entity.

TicksFrozen.title: Ticks Frozen
TicksFrozen.description: How many game ticks the entity has been freezing.
